title: Ryan Reynolds shares first picture of third child with Blake Lively
text:

Hollywood heavyweight Ryan Reynolds has shared with his 14.7 million followers their first look at his newborn baby.

An Us Weekly source reported that the baby's around two months old now.

Ryan, 42, and beautiful wife Blake Lively , 32, can be seen gazing into each other's eyes with a little bundle of joy snuggled between them.

The trio are in the beautiful Canadian wilderness, as Ryan wasn't actually posting about his new baby - rather, about climate policy.

He also may have confirmed the baby's gender in the caption.

The Deadpool star wrote: "I love BC. I want my daughters to experience the same natural playground I grew up in. On Oct. 21, the candidate you vote for will SHAPE CLIMATE POLICY.

"I'm proud of the climate progress made the last 4 years."

Many have taken this to mean that the Hollywood super couple have had another girl.

They already have two daughters, James, four, and Inez, two.

(Image: SartorialPhoto / SplashNews.com)

(Image: Rex Features)

Blake first let the world know she was expecting back in May, when she showed off her bump at the LA premiere of Ryan's film, Detective Pikachu.

Their marriage is the subject of a jealousy - the two conduct themselves with utmost love and respect for each other, but also some pretty savage humour.

Blake has previously dished about the secret to their wedded bliss - treat Ryan like one of her pals.

She explained: "In other relationships, if something came up I would call my girlfriends or my sister, and say, 'Hey, this is what he did - what should I do?'

"Whereas with him [Ryan], we were friends for two years before we were ever dating. And I treat him like my girlfriend."
description: Ryan was posting about the impact of climate policy in his native British Columbia and accompanied his words with a snap of him, wife Blake and their new baby
